inclusion.criterion: Women with ≥ 2 consecutive pregnancy losses (miscarriages or biochemical pregnancies)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ≤ completed gestational week 10 after ART with the present partner or with an egg/semen donor
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: ≥2 previous pregnancies with fetuses with known abnormal karyotype
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 37-year-old woman who came to the clinic for a routine Pap smear. She has cervical cancer, tested positive for HPV 16, and underwent tubal ligation.
